Color.title: Color
Color.description: Color of the car such as Silver, White, Red, Green, Blue, Orange, etc.

Has_Cruise_Control.title: Has_Cruise_Control
Has_Cruise_Control.description: Shows if the car is equipped with cruise control.

Has_Heated_Seats.title: Has_Heated_Seats
Has_Heated_Seats.description: Shows if the car is equipped with Heated Seats.

Has_Sunroof.title: Has_Sunroof
Has_Sunroof.description: Shows if the car has Sunroof

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Holds the status of the car such a Available, Sold, or In Service.

Transmission.title: Transmission
Transmission.description: Transmission mechanism of the car such as Manual or Automatic.
